data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Koch, C. L. (1841): Hoplophora ferruginea. In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Arachniden und Myriopoden. Regensburg: Pustet: 1, URL: http://www.biologie.uni-ulm.de/cgi-bin/imgobj.pl?id=73470&lang=e&sid=T
